materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of an canal area in Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There are two canal channels in the photograph, with a number of small boats along it. On the left of the photograph, there is a metal bridge. There are roofed buildings along the canals. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Roads & Canal, Batavia, Java
